# üöÄ GPU Model Guide ‚Äî Pick the Right Model for Your Hardware

Choose the model type that best fits your GPU. This keeps performance smooth and avoids out-of-memory errors.

---

## üü¶ Using a 4GB NVIDIA GPU?

Small but mighty! Stick with **SD 1.5 lightweight models**.

### Recommended:
- **DreamShaper (SD 1.5)**  
  üëâ [https://civitai.com/models/4384/dreamshaper](https://civitai.com/models/4384/dreamshaper)

### Helpful SD 1.5 Add-Ons
- **Negative Embedding:** BadDream / UnrealisticDream  
  üëâ [https://civitai.com/models/72437/baddream-unrealisticdream-negative-embeddings?modelVersionId=77169](https://civitai.com/models/72437/baddream-unrealisticdream-negative-embeddings?modelVersionId=77169)

- **LoRA:** Add More Details (Detail Enhancer)  
  üëâ [https://civitai.com/models/82098/add-more-details-detail-enhancer-tweaker-lora?modelVersionId=87153](https://civitai.com/models/82098/add-more-details-detail-enhancer-tweaker-lora?modelVersionId=87153)

---

## üü© Using an 8GB NVIDIA GPU?

## üîß Important: Install the Upscale Model

Make sure to use the **ComfyUI Model Manager** to install:

- **RealESRGAN_x2** (Upscaler)

---

# ü§ñ Quick Setup Guide ‚Äî Discord Bot Token

## 1Ô∏è‚É£ Get Your Bot Token

1. Go to:  
   üëâ [https://discord.com/developers/applications](https://discord.com/developers/applications)  
2. Select your application (or create a new one)  
3. Open **Bot** in the left sidebar  
4. Click **Reset Token** ‚Üí copy the new token  
5. Paste it into the `set_new_token` field in the node  
6. Under **Privileged Gateway Intents**, enable:  
   - ‚úÖ **Message Content Intent**

---

## 2Ô∏è‚É£ Invite Your Bot to Your Server

1. Go to **OAuth2 ‚Üí URL Generator**  
2. Under **Scopes**, check:  
   - ‚úîÔ∏è `bot`  
3. Under **Bot Permissions**, enable:  
   - ‚úîÔ∏è Send Messages  
   - ‚úîÔ∏è Read Message History  
   - ‚úîÔ∏è Attach Files  
   - ‚úîÔ∏è Add Reactions  
4. Copy the generated URL  
5. Open it, select your server, and invite the bot

---

## ‚úîÔ∏è Final Notes

- After entering your token once and queueing the node, the token is saved securely and will appear masked next time.  
- **Important:** Set the **Run Mode** to **Instant**  
  - Click the arrow next to **Run**  
  - Select **Instant** so the node processes messages immediately.

üéâ You‚Äôre all set!

# üêô KRAKEN DISCORD BOT ‚Äî COMMAND REFERENCE

Your complete guide to generating stunning images directly inside Discord.

---

## ‚ö° Commands

| Command | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| **!generate \<prompt>** | Generate an image from text |
| **!img2img \<prompt>** | Transform an attached image using your prompt |
| **!help** | Display help inside Discord |
| **!status** | Show queue and processing status |

---

## üéõÔ∏è Parameters

### Generation Controls
- **--negative \<text>**  
  Specify what to avoid (examples: `--negative blurry, distorted`)
- **--steps \<1‚Äì50>**  
  Number of generations steps *(default: 20)*
- **--cfg \<1‚Äì20>**  
  Prompt guidance strength *(default: 7)*
- **--seed \<number>**  
  Use a specific seed for repeatable results
- **--style \<name>**  
  Apply a preset style (see style list below)
- **--enhance**  
  Expands and improves your prompt using AI *(slower, higher quality)*
- **--upscale**  
  Upscales the final image *(requires an upscaler model configured)*

---

## üñºÔ∏è Size Presets

Use these flags to quickly set your aspect ratio:

- **--square** ‚Üí 1024 √ó 1024 *(default)*
- **--portrait** ‚Üí 832 √ó 1216  
- **--landscape** ‚Üí 1216 √ó 832  
- **--wide** ‚Üí 1344 √ó 768  
- **--tall** ‚Üí 768 √ó 1344  
- **--phone** ‚Üí 832 √ó 1216 *(same as portrait)*
- **--desktop** ‚Üí 1216 √ó 832 *(same as landscape)*

---

## üé® Style Presets  
*(Use with `--style <name>`)*

`photorealistic`, `anime`, `fantasy`, `scifi`,  
`artistic`, `cinematic`, `cute`, `dark`,  
`vintage`, `minimalist`

---

## ‚ú® Quick Modifiers  
Add these to enhance quality, lighting, style, and mood.

### Quality
`--masterpiece` `--detailed` `--hd` `--professional`

### Lighting
`--cinematic` `--dramatic` `--soft` `--golden`  
`--neon` `--backlit`

### Atmosphere
`--fog` `--mist` `--rain` `--snow`

### Time of Day
`--night` `--day` `--sunset` `--dawn`

### Style Themes
`--epic` `--dark` `--vibrant` `--muted`  
`--vintage` `--noir`

### Camera Effects
`--bokeh` `--dof` `--wideangle` `--macro`

### Artistic Flair
`--painterly` `--ethereal` `--gritty` `--clean`

---

## üß™ Examples
